entries.title: New York City public schools ban ChatGPT from its devices and networks
entries.description: New York City's Department of Education announced a ban on the popular chatbot ChatGPT from its schools’ devices and networks.

entries.title: Facebook weighs letting Trump back on the platform in a changed social media landscape
entries.description: After Facebook banned then-President Donald Trump in January 2021 following the Capitol attack, the company said it would reconsider his status on the platform

entries.title: Hamlin’s collapse spurs new wave of vaccine misinformation
entries.description: Unfounded claims about the safety of Covid-19 vaccines proliferated in the hours and days after Buffalo Bills safety Damar Hamlin collapsed during Monday’s

entries.title: Amazon says it will cut over 18,000 jobs, more than initially planned
entries.description: Amazon said Wednesday it will cut over 18,000 jobs, a bigger number than the e-retailer initially said it would be eliminating last year.
